Class SBP.Similarity

java.lang.Object
PartitionAlgorithm.implementation.SBP.Similarity
Enclosing class:
SBP
public class SBP.Similarity extends Object
Represents similarity information for a pair (or group) of tasks.

Each instance contains:

  • similarityRes - the list of SharedResource objects that are common to the tasks in the pair/group.
  • similarityTask - the TaskSet containing the tasks that participate in this similarity entry (typically two tasks).
Author:
ShiuJia
